title: The Agentic Web and Original Sin

rawLines.text: The agentic web and original sin was
published on Tuesday, May 20th,
2025. Ethan Zuckerman wrote in The
Atlantic in 2014, I have come to believe
that advertising is the original sin of
the web. The fallen state of our
internet is a direct, if unintentional,
consequence of choosing advertising as
the default model to support online

rounds of innovation and investor story

so therefore advertising became the

And I think Zuckermanman is too harsh on

What was not viable in the 1990s, nor at

obvious problem is that the fee
